I would like my child to eventually move into competitive swimming/join a swim team.
I would like to focus more on speed and distance/endurance.
I would like to focus on technique and shorter distances.

Dear Customer,\n\nThank you for registering with Waterworks Aquatics. You will be receiving an activation email shortly.
If you are concerned about your child\'s progress at any time, please

All make-up lesson credits must be USED within 6 days after the last paid lesson of the package if you do not plan on renewing OR they will ALL EXPIRE.

Make-up lessons may be used within 30 days after the end of the lesson package ONLY IF you are currently enrolled(You must renew within 6 days after the package ends and begin that new package)and payments are up to date.

Make-ups may not be scheduled more than 7 days in andvance. Day\, time\, and instructor preferences are not guaranteed for make-up class.

MAKE-UP LESSONS MAY NOT REPLACE OR BE SCHEDULED DURING YOUR REGULAR SCHEDULE LESSON DAY AND TIME. ALL MAKE-UPS MUST BE SCHEDULES AT DIFFERENT TIME OR DAY. If you release/end you schedule, your regular lesson time and day may NOT be used as a make-up.

PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU ARE ABLE TO ATTEND THE TIME YOU SCHEDULE THE MAKE-UP AS WE DO NOT RESCHEDULE MAKE-UP LESSONS FOR ANY RESON,INCLUDING ILLNESS.

Recurring billing is an enhanced method of payment where you do not have to come to our facility to make a payment. Instead, you choose a monthly package based on how many times a week your student swims and you are automatically charged near the end of every month. You pay using a checking account. Your payment details are stored, and all payment information is 100% secure. To cancel recurring billing at any time, please call our front desk at (949) 450–0777.

Recurring billing is an enhanced method of payment where you do not have to come to our facility to make a payment. Instead, you purchase a package monthly. You are automatically charged near the end of every month. You pay using a checking account. Your payment details are stored, and all payment information is 100% secure. To cancel recurring billing at any time, please call our front desk at (949) 450–0777.

Recurring billing is an enhanced method of payment where you do not have to come to our facility to make a payment. Instead, you purchase a package monthly and come in as many, or as few, times as you would like. You are automatically charged near the end of every month. You pay using a checking account. Your payment details are stored, and all payment information is 100% secure. To cancel recurring billing at any time, please call our front desk at (949) 450–0777.

Monthly billing is an enhanced method of payment where you, the customer, does not have to come to the site and order the items every month. An order will be placed automatically for you and you will be charged on your preffered payment method.\nWe store your payment details when you pay for the first order. It is 100% secure.\nYou can call our front desk at (949) 450–0777 and cancel the recurring payment any time.

CWOP (Cancel Without Penalty) & CIS (Call in sick) - This code is used when a client calls before 9:00 AM the day of their lesson. Any client with a class scheduled before 11:00 am, MUST call to cancel 2 hours prior to their lesson. A make up credit will be issued.
CWP– Cancel With Penalty. This code is used when client calls after the 9:00 AM deadline or less then 2 hours before the start time of the lesson. No make up credit will be issued.
NS (No Show)- This code is used when client does not show up to their lesson time. No make up credit issued.
CBW (Cancel by Waterworks) - This code is used when Waterworks cancels the class for any reason that is due to Waterworks such as a pool closure. The credit for this class will be added to the end of your package and this lesson will not be charged.
FRZ (Freeze) - This code is used when you use a benefit you have earned from being a loyal member. The credit for this class will be added to the end of your package and this lesson will not be charged.
If you would like to PERMANENTLY remove a class time / schedule, please click here.

resources.string: Please answer the questions below to help us determine your child\'s current swim level. This will help us match your child with the appropriate instructor and other student (if there is another student).
Question #1\n\nIs your child able to swim freestyle (the crawl), using big arms, to cross the length of a 25-yard pool, without touching the bottom or sides of the pool, and without assistance?
Question #2\n\nIs your child able to swim backstroke across the length (25 yards) of the pool by themselves without touching the bottom of the pool, the side of the pool and without assistance?
Question #2\n\nCan your child swim or kick half way across the pool (12.5 yards) without assistance by using side breathing or rolling from their stomach to their back?

Question #3\n\nDoes your child know how to swim legal Breaststroke without any flutter kicks across the length (25 yards) of the pool by themselves without touching the bottom of the pool, the side of pool and without assistance?
Question #3\n\nCan your child swim freestyle (the crawl) with 2 unassisted rollover breaths?

Question #4\n\nDoes your child know how to swim legal Butterfly without any flutter kicks across the length (25 yards) of the pool by themselves without touch the bottom of the pool, the side of the pool and without assistance?
Question #4\n\nCan your child keep their face and ears entirely in the water for 5 seconds?
Question #5\n\nDoes your child swim or have swum on a competitive swim team?
Question #6\n\nDoes your child know how to do freestyle and backstroke flip turns, dive off the starting blocks and streamline push-off the wall?
If you answered \'yes\' to the previous question, please use the space below to briefly describe your child\'s allergies/medical conditions.
No payments could be found for the selected criteria.

You are not currently on the waitlist for any lesson times. Please contact our office staff for assistance.

Make up lessons cannot be released. If you have Make up lessons already scheduled that you wish NOT to attend, these classes will have to be Cancelled With Penalty and will not be credited back to your account. If you would like to cancel these make ups, please
In addition to swimming classes, Waterworks Aquatics offers a variety of high quality aquatics programs for children and adults. Tap a program below to sign up or get more information.
Select students you would like to register.

Session prices vary by location and date. The following discounts are available at all sites.
Register for 3 sessions: $75 discount.
Register for 6 sessions: $200 discount.
Register for 9 sessions: $400 discount.
(8:00am early drop off is available at an additional cost of $40 per session).
Yes! I am aware that the meet begins at the time above and I must check-in online, by phone, or in person, no later than 1 hour prior to the start time of the meet.

In order for us to run a smooth and efficient swim meet, we ask for parent volunteers to help with timing the races. We like to have two timers for each lane to help ensure accurate results. As a timer you are guaranteed a front row seat for the meet, and for most of the races your seat will be in the shade. 

You will also get a free lunch combo from the snack shop which will be delivered to you on the pool deck, as well as front-of-the line privileges to pick up your child's ribbons after the meet. Please check in with the announcer no later than 10 minutes before the start time of the meet. At that time you will be given all the instructions and information needed. We ask all of our timers to time for the entire meet which is expected to last between 1.5-2.5 hours with a 10 minute break.

All participants MUST be checked-in by 12pm the day of the swim meet in order to be assigned a lane for their events.

Check-in is from 8am-12pm the day of the meet at the front desk; or you may check-in by phone or online between 7am-12pm the morning of the swim meet.
(760)603-9400 www.waterworksswimonline.com

The swim meet will begin promptly at 2:00pm.

You may arrive later to the meet as long as you are checked-in by phone or online by 12:00pm.

Estimated Timeline of Events:
2:00 I.M. & Butterfly Events
2:15 Backstroke Events
2:30 Backstroke Events
3:00 Freestyle Events

• A make-up lesson will be issued to your account for cancellations made with proper notice.

• NO make-ups or refunds will be issued for missed, cancelled, or untaken GROUP classes.

• If your lesson time is before 9:00am: In order to receive a make up lesson, you must cancel your class by 7:00am.

• If your lesson time is at or after 9:00am: In order to receive a make up lesson, you must cancel your class at least 2 hours prior to the class start time. 

• If you cancel after the times listed above, even in the case of illness, you will NOT receive a make-up lesson. 

• Make-up lessons may NOT replace or be scheduled during your regular lesson time.

• Make-up lessons CANNOT be added on to the end of your package.
Only events that the student qualifies for are displayed
Select starting preferences for each student

This app is for demonstrate the Material-ish progress wheel library, which provides a Material-style progress wheel compatible back to API 9. You can have indeterminate and determinate versions of the progress wheel, the later with a linear animation or a interpolated one like in the guidelines.\n\nRefer to the Github project page for more info at https://github.com/pnikosis/materialish-progress.
\u2022 Any changes you make in this app will affect your current account with Waterworks.

string.name: survey_text1
string.b: Your classes have NOT been released.

resources.string: We recommend attending lessons year-round as many children tend to forget what they have learned. In many cases, the student has to be taught basic skills all over again. For children that do not know how to swim across the pool OR children that are under 6 years old, it is most critical to keep attending lessons.
Please click the Make Payment button only ONCE Do not Click the browser refresh or reload.Your Account might get charged multiple times if you do so
If you want to continue past your end date, you \nmust extend your schedule 2 weeks prior to \nyour end date.
Lessons on this date and dates going forward\nwill be removed from your schedule.
Below are the primary skill requirements for a swimmer to progress to each level.\n\nAdditional skills are needed to advance.
Swim 5 feet from the wall with their face in the water using flutter kicking.
Swim Freestyle with 2 unassisted 5 second long roll-over breaths.
Swim half-way (12.5 yards) across the pool with roll-over breathing or side breaths.
Jump into the pool and swim back to the wall.
Swim Freestyle across the pool (25 yards) with roll-over breathing or side breaths.
Swim Freestyle across the pool (25 yards) with less than 5 second breaths while the instructor is 10 feet in front of the student Level 7.
Freestyle across the pool with the instructor behind the student.
Breaststroke half-way across the pool; competition “legal” kick is not required.
Head-first dive from the side of the pool.
Track start dive from the racing block.
Open turns for Breaststroke and Butterfly.
Swim 50 continuous yards of each of the 4 competitive strokes.
Sprinting and speed work on all 4 competitive strokes.
Technical improvements to form and efficiency on all 4 competitive strokes.
The routing number is a 9 digit bank identifiation number.\nIt can generally be found in the lower left corner on the front side of a check. See the image for additional details.

Swim Competitions are a great way to build confidence in your swimmers and for you to see improvement in their abilities!\nOpen to all swimmers up to age 16 who can swim across the pool (level 5 or higher).\nEvery participant receives a ribbon for their efforts! Staff will be available to jump in and help our littlest swimmers if necessary.

We have placed a temporary hold on the lessons you have selected. Please confirm \nyour selections before the hold expires.After you confirm your schedule, you will be asked \nto submit payment in order to finalize your schedule.

For your convenience, your schedule will be held for the next 10 minutes. Please submit your payment for lessons in order to finalize your schedule. If you decide not to make payment within this time frame, your schedule will be released.
